alert.note: Alert for Breathitt; Magoffin; Morgan; Wolfe (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Morgan, northwestern Breathitt, northwestern Magoffin and eastern Wolfe Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 900 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Vortex to Simpson to Noctor to Curt. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Simpson, Moct, Paxton, Keck and Taulbee around 905 PM EDT. Landsaw and Shockey around 910 PM EDT. Rosefork, Malaga, Upper Gilmore and Rock Lick around 915 PM EDT. Belknap, Burkhart, Lexie and Lee City around 920 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Bays, Wheel Rim, Burg, Haginsville, Lower Gilmore, Mountain Valley, Cutuno, Adele, Hazel Green, Gilmore, Daysboro, Cornelia, Netty, Stevenson, Helechawa, Dale, Cannel City, Eugene, Lykins, Puncheon, Sellars, Seiltz, Epson, Rousseau, Rexville, Hager, Caney, Lizzielane, Harper, Nickell, Demund, Bethanna, Payton, Holliday, Kernie, Guage and Foraker. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
